name: Dragon Ball GT S.H.Figuarts Super Saiyan 4 Vegeta
description:
From Tamashii Nations. Super Saiyan 4 Vegeta from Dragon Ball GT joins S.H.Figuarts!Super Saiyan 4 Vegeta, from Dragon Ball GT, has joined the S.H.Figuarts line!


From Dragon Ball GT, Super Saiyan 4 Vegeta is joining S.H.Figuarts!In the series, Vegeta attained this powerful form by absorbing a barrage Blutz Waves.

To give fans the power to pose Super Saiyan 4 Vegeta any way they like, this new figure has been designed with S.H.Figuarts' latest joints and modelling techniques!His shoulder and leg joints can be positioned to create a range of powerful, dynamic poses, and he's even been modeled in such a way that his voluminous hair doesn't interfere with moving his head and neck!
The figure also comes with a Final Shine Attack effect part!
Stand Super Saiyan 4 Vegeta on display alongside the separately sold S.H.Figuarts Super Saiyan 4 Goku to bring Dragon Ball GT to life before your very eyes!
Vegeta stands just under 6 inches tall, is highly articulated, and features several interchangeable parts for a wide variety of display options!


S.H.Figuarts SUPER SAIYAN 4 VEGETACompany：BANDAI SPIRITS CO., LTD.Target Age：For ages 15 and overSet includes：


Main Body
Three optional expression parts
Five pairs of optional hands
Final Shine Attack effect parts
Tail
